questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happenedâ€¦?

answers.answer: I went to the USA 2years ago. It was an amazing trip.
I've got a lot of things to tell you about this trip , but I must to make a choice. We were driving when my mum said : look at the sea, girls !!!
When I saw this whale in the sea , I could not believe it. It was so magical to see this big animal in the sea.
